node.display_long_description:
Rec Room - Join the Club!

Rec Room is THE place for you and your friends to build and play games together. Party up with Rec Roomers from all around the world to chat, hang out, explore millions of player-created rooms, or build something new and amazing to share with us all.
Rec Room is free, and cross plays on everything from phones to VR headsets. It’s the social app you play like a video game!

- Customize and dress up your cute Rec Room avatar to express your style
- Discover challenging, fun or straight up weird games made by creators just like you
- Try your skill with the Maker Pen
- Join the best community - Rec Room is a fun and welcoming place for people from all walks of life! Let us help you find people you’ll LOVE to hang out with.

Come and join the club!

Enhance your experience with the optional membership to Rec Room Plus (RR+) for $7.99/Month. Cancel at any time. Membership gives you access to free items, exclusive content, and tons of tokens.

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
Rec Room PATCH - the "Take a Seat" edition

##Suggested Friend Invites

Tired of all the lame excuses your friends give you for not joining you in Rec Room? Well, we have now made it harder for them to resist! Now, iOS players can invite people from their contacts list and Steam / Xbox players can invite people from their platform friends list to join Rec Room with one click! [That's right, _just one click!_](https://imgur.com/a/RTawchR)

- To access this feature, open your watch --> Home page --> Invite button on the top right corner.
- The list will only show people who haven't played Rec Room yet. If your friend is not a Rec Room player but isn't on that list, you can still copy and share your link with them. We don't know why some don't show up, but hey, that's Rec Room for ya!
- Friends who sign up for Rec Room using your invite will automatically get added as your Rec Room friend when they return to their Dorm after completing the tutorial. See? Their resistance was futile.


## General Improvements and Bug Fixes

- The Streaming Camera was previously only available for PC VR, but is now also available to Screens PC players with a second display -- no VR headset required! This was supposed to land with the streaming camera improvements, but a minor Unity upgrade broke it. Whoops! (At least Rec Room doesn't require focus again!)
- AI from CV1 UGC Spawners will now properly despawn on Game End. No more zombie goblins _sad trombone_.
- When objects manage to get below the ground in \^RecCenter and Maker rooms, they will now return to their last spawn position instead of their last pickup position.
- We fixed the bug in VR where doors wouldn't open if your hands were full, so now you don't have to put down your donuts to use a door. You're welcome! (who says we don't fix important bugs?)

As always, thanks for playing Rec Room!

Please see here for convenient links to controls, tutorials, comfort options, etc.: https://recroom.com/community
We love to hear your feedback, so please don't hesitate to let us know what you think...

node.reviewDescription:
As seen in the title,
Please Read.

I know Rec Room is such a fun game to make friends on.
But there's kids using voice changers (A.K.A the voice pitch) pretending they are adults.

And then they swear, most kids ive seen in the center roast eachother, not as a JOKE.

Most of them they say, "F**k you, Go die bi**h, Suffer in hell cancer boy."

I mean- that's too far bro-

I didn't wanna report it so I just write a review.

Most adults TOO swear.

They kinda bully children.

In 20 May, I was in the Rec Center, then I found this boy with his girl-friend

In the cafeteria.

I was holding the trash for no reason, then the boy grabbed the trash and said;

"Put it on yo head, because yo trash",

WITH A FRIKIN VOICE CHANGER ON-

nah dude im out

I talked back;

How about you put it on? Because your like literally a 7 year old using a f**king voice changer.

He was like- "awkward silence"

Then the girl said:

Man shes right how bout u put it on

I was like-

"ok my job is done ill let this girl finish her sentence"

Anyways, that's all I gotta say! 

Please stay safe and make sure to drink a lot of water.

Have a good day/night! <3
